nodes.text: Unar was a member of the Imperial Diplomatic Service that served as the reconstituted Sith Empire's ambassador to the Hutt Cartel and its leader, Supreme Mogul Karagga the Unyielding. When Karagga began to expand Hutt Space, he executed Unar as a way of severing ties with the Empire. Ambassador Rove was appointed in Unar's place.
